metadata.description:
Tangerine Dream is an ode to my hometown, Boston. This song represents how the place where I grew up has amplified my drive and helped me dream bigger as I rise as an independent musician.  

When I wrote the record in 2018, I had never done an overseas show or traveled for my music before. I had hardly any streams but still felt confident that my music would take me around the world one day. Fast forward to 2023, I've done 40+ shows in both the US and Europe and have performed in front of thousands of people. I can easily attribute the manifestation of those experiences to the lyrics written and performed in this song.

As I write this, Tangerine Dream has amassed 2.9 million streams on Spotify alone. It’s an accomplishment that I can proudly say was achieved with no marketing, no management, and no label. 

Still independent. Still chasing the highest of heights. I hope this song brings as much magic into your life as it has mine.

Produced by Massachusetts native Mozado.

lyrics.text:
Need something new to call my own
Can't do this all alone
Ever luminous my future look
I knew it all along (Too long I been)

Gone from the city life
But it's back to the main land
The fruits of my labor
Tangerine Dream, boy been ripe with the flavor
I stick to the music
Ya'll stuck to a label
Na mean?
Records what turning the table it seem
I go berserk for my wildest dreams
That since a teen
Right next to Fenway a monster off green (Oh)

And carry on
Pass blunts on the merry go
City lights shine, I project on the stereo
Pru scrape the sky so my thoughts in a parallel
Neigh horse power when you stuck on the carousel

(Awe)
Order a round now she falling in love
We still unfinished
I Can't get enough
Having the upper hand fit like a glove
Ingrained in the style I been looking for

Need something new to call my own
Can't do this all alone
Ever luminous my future look
I knew it all along

Something new to call my own
Can't do this all alone
This music play a part of us
I knew it all along (Too long I been)

Goin through the motions
In love with the potion
I scribble the notes cuz I'm stuck on this notion 
That cause and effect end up causing commotion
I pass on the wisdom, still puff on the Yoda
Put gas in the motor, I move with a motive
Like Lucky my brand stuff my pocket with potus
Don't stick to the script, they won't never stop scrolling
If it don't make waves don't mean ship to a showman

I
Shoulda known
I shoulda known
Been all around the world but don't nowhere feel as good as home
In due time, don't you tell me that I took too long
Hung up on the line
Sing the hook
What I hooked you on (Uh)
Search no further shawty I got what you looking for
Plus you got that angel cake
An angel what I took you for
But of course
Better than your ex how I came across
Better then yoour next
Golden Boy
We the best in Boston

Something new to call my own
Can't do this all alone

Something new to call my own
Can’t do this all alone

metadata.title: Tangerine Dream
